title: Commercializing Internet Software
description: The podcast narrates the journey of building a software company to create internet software, a decision considered heretical at the time. It reflects on the initial doubts and risks associated with the idea, which later proved to be the most obvious choice. The host recalls the commercialization process and how it paved the way for future successes.
